name: Syk's Room
description:
What is this game?

In this fangame, you live your life as YouTube streamer Sykkuno. You get to explore your room and decide how you want to spend your day! Will you stream, seek out your friends, or will you do absolutely nothing? It's all up to you baybeee

It's a lot of inside jokes and silly humor, and it's mostly a gift to the community :D

(Also, this was a huge passion project for me. I've never made a game before so this was a cool learning experience.)

Note:

Click the fullscreen button twice in the browser version and it should enter fullscreen!

Found a bug?

You can DM it to me on Twitter @ChickenPoofer! I'm gonna do my best to iron out any weird bugs.
